title: What’s Next for Kyrie Irving’s Career?
description: Irving’s antisemitic movie post is his biggest controversy yet. But the potential fallout could affect not just his basketball career but the N.B.A. itself.
dc:creator: Jonathan Abrams and Sopan Deb
category: St Patrick High School Academy (Elizabeth, NJ)

media:content.media:description: Nets guard Kyrie Irving has been suspended since Nov. 3 after he would not say that he did not have antisemitic beliefs. But there are signals he may be back soon.
